Class ParentDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.ParentDAO
public class ParentDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for Parent entities. Provides CRUD operations for the Parent table in the database.

  • Method Details

    • addParent

      public int addParent(Parent parent) throws SQLException
      Creates a new parent in the database.
      Parameters:
      parent - The parent object to be added to the database
      Returns:
      The generated parent ID if successful
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • getParentById

      public Optional<Parent> getParentById(int parentId)
      Retrieves a parent by their ID.
      Parameters:
      parentId - The ID of the parent to retrieve
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the parent if found, or empty if not found

    • getParentByUserId

      public Optional<Parent> getParentByUserId(int userId)
      Retrieves a parent by user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user associated with the parent
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the parent if found, or empty if not found

    • getAllParents

      public List<Parent> getAllParents()
      Retrieves all parents from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all parents

    • updateParent

      public boolean updateParent(Parent parent)
      Updates an existing parent record.
      Parameters:
      parent - The parent object with updated information
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • deleteParent

      public boolean deleteParent(int parentId)
      Deletes a parent from the database.
      Parameters:
      parentId - The ID of the parent to delete
      Returns:
      true if the deletion was successful, false otherwise

    • addParentWithValidation

      public int addParentWithValidation(Parent parent, User user) throws SQLException, IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a parent with validation.
      Parameters:
      parent - The parent to add
      user - The user object associated with the parent
      Returns:
      The generated parent ID if successful
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs
      IllegalArgumentException - If validation fails

    • getParentDetails

      public Optional<ParentDetailsDTO> getParentDetails(int parentId)
      Retrieves parent details including user information.
      Parameters:
      parentId - The ID of the parent
      Returns:
      An Optional containing parent details if found, or empty if not found

    • getAllParentsWithNames

      public List<ParentDetailsDTO> getAllParentsWithNames() throws SQLException
      Gets all parents with their names from the database
      Returns:
      A list of ParentDetailsDTO objects containing parent info with names
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs
